text: Amazon is back with some great deals again, this time offering the fantastic 27″ Apple Studio Display for just $1299, and the Apple Watch Series 10 for just $329. Why pay full price when you don’t have to? Apple Studio Display 27″ for $1299 (down from $1599) The Apple Studio Display is a gorgeous Retina 27″ external screen option with 5K 5120×2880 resolution, with anti-glare glass, and an adjustable tilt stand. The Apple retail price is $1599, but Amazon is selling the Apple Studio Display right now for just $1299. Apple Studio Display also includes a built-in 12MP camera with Center Stage, a microphone, and six built-in speakers. You’ll also gain a Thunderbolt 3 port, and three USB-C ports, making the Apple Studio Display an excellent addition to your Mac workspace. Apple Studio Display for $1,299 (down from $1,599) Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399) Apple Watch Series 10 is a fantastic fitness tracker and smart watch, and it’s available at an 18% on Amazon, starting at just $329 in various color and band options. With a nice and crisp 42mm always-on display, excellent fitness and activity tracking features, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection and fall detection with Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gestures, water resistance, voice control, Siri commands, all-day battery life, and more, you’ll be sure to enjoy the latest Apple Watch. Get Apple Watch Series 10 for $329 (down from $399 MSRP) AirTags 4-pack for $70 (down from $99) Amazon continues to the 4-pack of AirTag trackers for just $70, down from the $99 retail price. Whether you want to keep track of your personal belongings, baggage, briefcase, backpack, purse, car, scooter, bike, cat, dog, or nearly anything else, the AirTag is a great little tracker that uses the Find My network. AirTags – 4-pack – $69.99 (down from $99) FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
html:
Amazon is back with some great deals again, this time offering the fantastic 27″ Apple Studio Display for just $1299, and the Apple Watch Series 10 for just $329. Why pay full price when you don’t have to?

Apple Studio Display 27″ for $1299 (down from $1599)

The Apple Studio Display is a gorgeous Retina 27″ external screen option with 5K 5120×2880 resolution, with anti-glare glass, and an adjustable tilt stand. The Apple retail price is $1599, but Amazon is selling the Apple Studio Display right now for just $1299.

Apple Studio Display also includes a built-in 12MP camera with Center Stage, a microphone, and six built-in speakers. You’ll also gain a Thunderbolt 3 port, and three USB-C ports, making the Apple Studio Display an excellent addition to your Mac workspace.

  • Apple Studio Display for $1,299 (down from $1,599)

Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399)

Apple Watch Series 10 is a fantastic fitness tracker and smart watch, and it’s available at an 18% on Amazon, starting at just $329 in various color and band options. With a nice and crisp 42mm always-on display, excellent fitness and activity tracking features, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection and fall detection with Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gestures, water resistance, voice control, Siri commands, all-day battery life, and more, you’ll be sure to enjoy the latest Apple Watch.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 10 for $329 (down from $399 MSRP)

AirTags 4-pack for $70 (down from $99)

Amazon continues to the 4-pack of AirTag trackers for just $70, down from the $99 retail price. Whether you want to keep track of your personal belongings, baggage, briefcase, backpack, purse, car, scooter, bike, cat, dog, or nearly anything else, the AirTag is a great little tracker that uses the Find My network.

  • AirTags – 4-pack – $69.99 (down from $99)

FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
